title: India focused on urban infrastructure, e-mobility, and renewable energy for growth: FM Sitharaman
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman emphasized the need for sustainable infrastructure amid climate change and geopolitical tensions at the AIIB meeting in Samarkand. She urged AIIB to support countries facing debt burdens and highlighted India's focus on urban infrastructure, e-mobility, and renewable energy as key growth drivers.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
